product_details.name: Vintage-Style Halloween Pumpkin Character Box - Whimsical Holiday Decor
product_details.description:
• Hand-painted decorative Halloween collectible with charming vintage-inspired design
• Dual-piece construction featuring a smiling green pumpkin head and decorative base
• Festive color palette combining orange, green, black, and burgundy tones
• Adorable party hat detail with polka dot pattern and orange ball topper
• Classic harlequin diamond pattern on the bottom section
• Unique folk art style with cute facial features and decorative accents
• Perfect size for tabletop display or Halloween collection showcase
• Durable construction suitable for seasonal display and storage
• Charming retro aesthetic ideal for vintage Halloween enthusiasts
• Makes an excellent gift for holiday decor collectors

banner_details:
This festive banner features a rich, radial gradient background blending deep indigo and violet tones. At the top, a bold, playful heading (`heading`) is styled in a bright orange hue, setting a vibrant tone. Positioned centrally is a white circular frame outlined with a dashed orange line, showcasing the main product image (`product_image`). Just above it, a subheading (`subheading`) is set in clean white text with modern typography to highlight the product category. To the right of the image sits a prominent round price badge (`price`), using a warm orange-to-dark-orange radial fill with navy blue text. Below, a concise description (`description`) in white lists product highlights, accompanied by subtle decorative flourishes. At the bottom, a standout rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) in tomato red supports white label text (`cta`) urging viewers to take action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Indigo: `#2C1B47`
- Bright Orange: `#FFA500`
- Burnt Orange: `#FF8C00`
- Tomato Red: `#FF6347`
- Soft White: `#F5F5F5`
- Gold Accent: `#FFD700`
product_color: The product features a whimsical Halloween-themed design using a bold and contrasting color palette that makes it lively and eye-catching. Key colors include pumpkin orange (#F26B1D), muted green (#7C8D3A), deep black (#231F20), rich magenta-purple (#8C3C64), and bright yellow (#F2D03B). Accents of soft red-orange (#D6542B) highlight facial details and decorations. The colors are blended smoothly where needed, like the green face subtly striped with burnt red, while others are sharply contrasted such as the black and orange diamond pattern that creates visual dynamism. Strong hues are used strategically to both highlight expressions and maintain a festive, playful vibe.
